description:
This ultra impressive federation style home boasts an attractive bluestone façade with a bullnose verandah and boasts loads of character and charm...

As you make your way up the paved double driveway that leads to the double garage, then as you stroll past the front of the home to the private entrance, you can immediately appreciate that this property is something pretty special and is different to most in the area.

The separate entrance foyer gives a lovely first impression and flows through to the classy formal living room that comes with a feature gas fireplace, ceiling rose with fan and leads through to the formal dining which is also a lovely room. The main bedroom is located on the other side of the entrance and is a good size. It comes with a large walk-in robe and a private ensuite bathroom. The front formal section of this home can be completely closed off and separated from the rear of the home if and when required.

In the centre of the home is a well appointed timber kitchen that offers stainless steel appliances including a Westinghouse wall oven, a Bosch dishwasher and a gas cook top with a range hood. There are dual sinks and plenty of bench and cupboard storage. Adjacent to the kitchen is a casual meals area and a spacious family room that has an open plan feel to it with large picture windows that let lots of natural light fill the room, whilst at the same time frame a lovely tranquil outlook of the back yard. There is a gas heater and a split system air conditioning unit in this section of the home.

Bedrooms 2, 3 and 4 are all located at the rear of the home and all come with ceiling fans, two with built-in robes. These bedrooms are serviced by a popular 3-way designed main bathroom and a separate laundry room.

Some additional features of this home include ducted reverse cycle air conditioning throughout, lofty 9ft ceilings with feature ornate cornicing, private internal entry from the double garage into the home, dual automatic roller door access into double garage, there is an instant gas hot water service with multiple temperature control pads and the added benefit of a solar panel system on the roof.

Outside you'll notice a very neat easy care front yard that also offers some good privacy from the street. Out the back features a bullnose verandah that stretched along the side of the home and a separate gabled pergola area at the rear. There is a sparkling in-ground swimming pool that is solar heated and is fully fenced, with a small garden/tool shed around the back.

This property is completely ready to simply move in and start enjoying the easy care nature of the yard, the quality of the home and the convenience of the location with easy access to schools, shops and transport, only a short distance to the beach and so much more...

An inspection of this property is highly recommended! If you require any additional information, or would like to have a chat about this property or if you need any assistance, please make contact with David Hams on 0402204841 anytime...

All floor plans, photos and text are for illustration purposes only and are not intended to be part of any contract. All measurements are approximate and details intended to be relied upon should be independently verified. (RLA 222182)
